import React from "react"; const UserData = ({userData, deleteUser}) => { return (
{userData.firstName}
{userData.lastName}
{userData.emailId}
Edit deleteUser(e,userData.id)} className="text-indigo-600 hover:text-indigo-800 hover:cursor-pointer">Delete
) } export default UserData;
